basic.description:
Diatonic voice-leading and harmony, principles of form and small structures (binary, ternary) through part-writing and analysis.
NOTE  Students holding First-Class Honours standing in the Royal Conservatory Grade II Rudiments may enrol in the course with permission of the School.
LEARNING HOURS    240 (72L;24T;144P)
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Theory and Analysis I
